app.get_db_connection()[source]¶

Creates a connection to the MySQL database.

Returns:

MySQL database connection

Return type:

mysql.connector.connection.MySQLConnection

app.generate_mbti_playlist(cursor, mbti_type)[source]¶

Generates a 10-song playist based on MBTI type with proportional distribution: - 5 songs from primary genre (affinity=3) - 3 songs from secondary genre (affinity=2) - 2 songs from tertiary genre (affinity=1)

Parameters:

  • cursor – Database cursor

  • mbti_type – Four-letter MBTI type (e.g., “INFJ”)

Returns:

List of song dictionaries

app.start_quiz()[source]¶

Start a new quiz session.

This endpoint returns info about the available questions.

Returns:

JSON with quiz details

Return type:

flask.Response

Statuscode 201:

Quiz info retrieved

Statuscode 500:

Server error

app.get_question(question_number)[source]¶

Get a specific question by its order number.

Parameters:

question_number (int) – The question order number (1-based)

Returns:

JSON with question detais and answer options

Return type:

flask.Response

Statuscode 200:

Question retrieved successfully

Statuscode 404:

Question not found

Statuscode 500:

Server error

app.process_answers()[source]¶

Process all answers at once and get personality results and music recommendations.

This endpoint takes an array of answers, calculates the MBTI personality type, and generates personalized music recommendations based on the results.

Returns:

JSON with personality profile and music recommendations

Return type:

flask.Response

Statuscode 200:

Answers processed successfully with results

Statuscode 400:

Invalid request format

Statuscode 500:

Server error

Example request:

POST /api/quiz/process-answers HTTP/1.1
Host: example.com
Accept: application/json
Content-Type: application/json

{
  "answers": [
    {"question_id": 1, "selected_option_id": 2},
    {"question_id": 2, "selected_option_id": 4},
    ...
  ]
}
app.get_playlist(playlist_id)[source]¶

Get a specific playlist with its songs.

This endpoint retrieves the details of a specific playlist.

Parameters:

playlist_id (str) – The ID of the playlist

Returns:

JSON with playlist details and tracks

Return type:

flask.Response

Statuscode 200:

Playlist retrieved successfully

Statuscode 404:

Playlist not found

Statuscode 500:

Server error

app.get_mbti_types()[source]¶

Get information about all MBTI personality types.

This endpoint provides a summary of all 16 MBTI personality types and their associated music preferences.

Returns:

JSON with MBTI types and their music preferences

Return type:

flask.Response

Statuscode 200:

MBTI types retrieved successfully

Statuscode 500:

Server error

app.index()[source]¶

Root endpoint that returns basic API info.

Returns:

JSON with API information

Return type:

flask.Response

Statuscode 200:

API info retrieved successfully
